pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, August 22, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a commemorative ceremony in honour of the 75th anniversary of the Dieppe Raid.

National War Memorial and the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca.
